Text: Thanks for the upload Gopo. Excellent picture quality as usual. And very small file size too. Great work. However this time I think you set the audio level too high during the transfer. The sound is very impressive but it becomes congested and breaks up at the loudest parts. Other than that, great work. Keep it up. Always look forwaed to your releases.
